mapper.update: update dcdg_bussiness_order_operate set ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=CHAR}, CHILD_ID = #{childId,jdbcType=CHAR}, ORDER_STATUS_BEFORE = #{orderStatusBefore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORDER_STATUS_NOW = #{orderStatusNow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OPT_REMARK = #{optRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPT_SOURCE = #{optSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_USER_ID = #{subUserId,jdbcType=CHAR}, SUB_USER_NAME = #{subUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where OPT_ID = #{optId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select OPT_ID, ORDER_ID, CHILD_ID, ORDER_STATUS_BEFORE, ORDER_STATUS_NOW, OPT_REMARK, OPT_SOURCE, USER_ID, USER_NAME, SUB_USER_ID, SUB_USER_NAME, ADD_TIME from dcdg_bussiness_order_operate where OPT_ID = #{optId,jdbcType=CHAR}
select OPT_ID, ORDER_ID, CHILD_ID, ORDER_STATUS_BEFORE, ORDER_STATUS_NOW, OPT_REMARK, OPT_SOURCE, USER_ID, USER_NAME, SUB_USER_ID, SUB_USER_NAME, ADD_TIME from dcdg_bussiness_order_operate
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO dcdg_bussiness_order_operate (OPT_ID, ORDER_ID, CHILD_ID, ORDER_STATUS_BEFORE, ORDER_STATUS_NOW, OPT_REMARK, OPT_SOURCE, USER_ID, USER_NAME, SUB_USER_ID, SUB_USER_NAME, ADD_TIME) VALUES
(#{item.optId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.orderId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.childId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.orderStatusBefore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.orderStatusNow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.optRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.optSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.subUserId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.subUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: select OPT_ID, ORDER_ID, ORDER_STATUS_BEFORE, ORDER_STATUS_NOW,USER_NAME,SUB_USER_NAME, ADD_TIME from dcdg_bussiness_order_operate where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND ORDER_STATUS_NOW IN(101,201,401,501 ) GROUP BY ORDER_ID,ORDER_STATUS_NOW ORDER BY ADD_TIME ASC
